resources.string: The following instruction files could not be parsed:
The filename contains non UTF-8 unicode characters but I only know how to parse UTF-8 characters.
I can only use the following file formats: aac, flac, mkv, mp3 mp4, m4a, ogg (preferred), wav for audio files and jpg and png (preferred) for image files.
The segment following the second underscore must be a number, representing the cue time in milliseconds.
The filename must be of the format <x-ray subject>_<language>_<cue time in milliseconds>.ogg (or appropriate file extension).
